message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40%.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair!
Bob, my offer is now 55/45.  It's the same split you wanted last round, and it's the best you'll get.
You said 55/45 was the best I'd get, but I think I can do better. Considering inflation is hurting you, I'll take a bit more.
Bob, let's be real. This is getting us nowhere. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  It's the most rational choice given the circumstances.
